thread.title: Eddie Doku records landslide victory to retain position as Greater Accra RFA chairman
thread.title_full: Eddie Doku records landslide victory to retain position as Greater Accra RFA chairman

title: Eddie Doku records landslide victory to retain position as Greater Accra RFA chairman
text:
Sports News | 13 October 2015 03:55 CET Eddie Doku records landslide victory to retain position as Greater Accra RFA chairman Eddie Doku 
Eddie Doku recorded a landslide victory to retain his seat as Greater Accra Regional Football Association chairman. 
He polled 72 votes as against the 17 chalked by his main contender Eugene Jacquaye, who is bankrolller for Lashibi United, on Monday. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com
